title: Leclerc2019
author: Leclerc2019
created_time: September 07, 2023, 09:57:03 PMLast edit: September 15, 2023, 08:35:09 AM by Leclerc2019
content: ============================== Formula Bounty chat ==============================To participate you need a BSC WalletNO KYCBOUNTY POOL = 250.000.000 BASH• Discord – 20%• Telegram – 10%• Twitter – 20%• Reddit – 15%• Blog – 15%• YouTube – 20%===========================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:•  If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.•  Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.•  If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.•  Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.•  The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.•  The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.•  Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.•  You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).•  Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.•  We will update the stakes [weekly].Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign). 5 posts per week: 2 stake 10 posts per week: 3 stake 15 posts per week: 4 stake 20 posts per week: 5 stake25+ posts per week: 6 stake  Rules:  1. You must join the Telegram group: https://t.me/bankcrash_official2. You must write at least 5 messages a week about the project (message must relate to the BANKCRASH) and conduct a dialogue with the participants in the project telegram chat.3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.4. The words "hi, hello, bye, goodbye, etc." are not counted.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the telegram!6. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 or @kateee110) Code:Week # : Telegram Profile Link Spreadsheet #: Amount of posts per week:  Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign).5 posts per week: 1 stake10 posts per week: 2 stake15 posts per week: 3 stake20 posts per week: 4 stake25+ posts per week: 5 stake Rules: 1. You must join the Discord group: https://discord.com/invite/KC3rds9wab2. You must write at least 5 messages a week about the project (message must relate to the BANKCRASH project) and conduct a dialogue with the participants in the project discord chat.3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.4. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the Discord chat!6. Words of greeting "hi, hello, etc." and words of goodbye "bye, goodbye" are not counted.7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 and @kateee110)Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join the Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/bankcrash_official and ttps://discord.com/invite/KC3rds9wab2. Each Participant should join the official Twitter: https://twitter.com/BankCrashAlert3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign.4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #BANKCRASH #AIRDROP #Crypto #BINANCE5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.6. All report must be on time or else you will get 0.7. If you have no new posts from our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about BANKCRASH and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the FLEAMINT website.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddit: r/cryptomoonshots, r/altcoin, r/defi and etc.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 7 posts per week. A maximum of 2 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.10. You must join the Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/bankcrash_official and ttps://discord.com/invite/KC3rds9wabCode:Week # : Reddit Profile Link:Carma:  Spreadsheet #: Links of Reddit posts:1.2.3.4. We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent : 36 stakesVery good : 24 stakesGood : 12 stakesRules:1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website.2. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.3. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your BTT profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.4. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on the blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.5. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.6. You must join the Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/Fleamintecosystem and https://discord.gg/yUtjCykbhuBest Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video : 12 stakes Rules:1. You must join the Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/Fleamintecosystem and https://discord.gg/yUtjCykbhu2. Video must be 2 minutes long.3. Videos must include link to the official website in the description.4. Must have your BitcoinTalk username in the description.5. Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers.6. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission.7. We would accept any positive video about BANKCRASH, not only about the ICO, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, ICO etc.8. No more than two videos from one person.=========================WEEK 1 (07.09-13.09)=========================
